original_text: And Moses lifted up his hand, and with his rod he smote the rock twice: and the water came out abundantly, and the congregation drank, and their beasts also.
korean_text: 모세가 그의 손을 들어 그의 지팡이로 반석을 두 번 치니 물이 많이 솟아나오므로 회중과 그들의 짐승이 마시니라

sentences.original_text: And Moses lifted up his hand
and with his rod he smote the rock twice
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 지팡이로 바위를 두 번 쳤으며

sentences.original_text: and the water came out abundantly
